translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まさに世界の半分をもらえますよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You will literally receive half of the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔剣カオスを操り幾多の魔人を倒した力を大将軍ピサロ様は高く評価しています
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Great General Pizarro highly values the power of manipulating the Demon Sword Chaos and defeating countless demons.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 実際の会談となる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This leads to an actual conference.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大将軍ピサロは来てなかったが、４名の魔物将軍と魔人レイ、そしてコンバート
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Great General Pizarro was not present, but four demon generals, the demon Ray, and Convert were there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは彼らに会う前にカオスだけは預からせて欲しいと言われたので預けている（ただし偽者）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before meeting them, Lance was asked to entrust only Chaos, so he did (however, it was a fake).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここで向こうも信じ切って対談しようとしてくるが、ランスはがははと裏切り斬りかかる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At this point, they fully trust and try to negotiate, but Lance laughs and betrays them with a slash.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最初にレイに斬りつけ重傷を負わす
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He first slashes Ray, inflicting a serious wound.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 屋敷の給仕をしていた者はほとんどが先に進入していたランスの部下達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Most of those serving in the mansion were Lance's subordinates who had entered earlier.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタ他メイドさんズ、フレイア
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Biscetta and other maids, Freya.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ４名の魔物将軍を殺し、魔人レイを追い詰める
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They kill the four demon generals and corner the demon Ray.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: (２４０／４／会談３)の後の戦闘、３ラウンド目
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After (240/4/Meeting 3), battle round 3.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイは、不意打ちで喰らったカオスの傷が深くきつい状況
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ray is in a tough situation, badly wounded from the surprise strike of Chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんなチャンスまたとないぞ、いまのうちに一気にせめろ、ぶっ殺せ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is a rare chance—attack all at once now, kill him!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 必要ならシーザー他がランス達がレイとだけ戦える状況らしている事の補足
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If necessary, Caesar and others ensure that Lance and his group are in a situation to fight only Ray.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: (２４０／４／会談３)の後の戦闘、６ラウンド目
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After (240/4/Meeting 3), battle round 6.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くそっ、しぶとい、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Damn, persistent,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰か魔物兵かコンバートとかがレイに脱出を促す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone, perhaps a demon soldier or Convert, urges Ray to escape.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あほか、この俺様がやすやすと逃がすか、てめぇの死に場所はここだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are you stupid? Do you think I’ll let you escape so easily? This is where you die.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイ　くそっ、やばい所に一撃を受けてしまった・・うまくうこげねぇ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ray: Damn, I took a hit in a bad spot... I can’t move well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どりゃ、どりゃ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Take this, take this!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レイは逃げ出す。ランスは追いかける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Ray flees. Lance pursues.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全て見切っていたわと、カチューシャを追い詰める
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Having seen through everything, he corners Katyusha.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうか、クレインか・・魔女が居たのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, Crane huh... There was a witch.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何故だ、こちら側の人間だと思ったのに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why? I thought she was on our side.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪のコントロールは必要無い、俺は正義だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't need to be controlled by evil, I am justice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪は俺が倒すから問題ない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No problem since I’ll defeat evil.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それにセックスで俺をコントロールとか甘い甘い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And trying to control me through sex? That’s naive, naive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺は世界で一番いい女を沢山抱いてきた男だぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm a man who's embraced the best women in the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全裸になってマンコ広げて詫びたら許してやるぞ、がははは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you get naked, spread your pussy, and apologize, I might forgive you. Gahahaha.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カチューシャはランスに捕まる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Katyusha is captured by Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 街中を逃げていくレイ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ray runs through the town.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんなレイを助けたのはメアリーだった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was Mary who helped Ray.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、魔軍
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, the Demon Army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピサロに攻められているコンバート
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Convert is being attacked by Pizarro.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ですが、本来の予定であった本作戦は成功させます、信じて下さい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, we will carry out the original plan successfully. Please believe in us.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 失敗したら殺す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you fail, you will be killed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やばいやばい、あれはわいやない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh no, no, that wasn’t me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カチューシャのアホがかってに早とちりしたんや
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That idiot Katyusha jumped to conclusions on her own.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスか、ヘルマンでもわいの地位を奪った男や
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance, huh? He’s the man who took my position even from Hellman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゆるさへんで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I won’t forgive him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: Ｍランド、夕食後とか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: M Land, after dinner or so...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス、志津香、ナギあたりと会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation with Lance, Shizuka, and Nagi.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これからどうするの、しばらくまだ自由都市に居る？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What are you going to do now? Will you stay in the Free City for a while?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レイは傷を負わせたがまだ止めは刺していないからな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Ray was wounded but not finished off yet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、なかなか出てこないな・・うーん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But he’s not coming out easily... hmm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と言いながら立つランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance stands up saying that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、シィルちゃんの所に行くんだ、エッチだなぁ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, you're going to Seele’s place? How naughty.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それともマリアの所かしら？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or maybe Maria’s place?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とか何か言われる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone says something like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふん、ガキと違って大人は仕事で忙しいのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmph, unlike kids, adults are busy with work.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今夜は・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tonight...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Choice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　敵の情報を精査する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Examine enemy information

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　味方の情報を精査する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Examine ally information

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セシルを呼び出して、セシルとエロするランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance calls Cecil and has erotic time with her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 捕まえたカチューシャをエロするランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance has erotic time with the captured Katyusha.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まさに世界の半分をもらえますよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You will literally receive half of the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔剣カオスを操り幾多の魔人を倒した力を大将軍ピサロ様は高く評価しています
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Great General Pizarro highly values the power of manipulating the Demon Sword Chaos and defeating countless demons.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 実際の会談となる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This leads to an actual conference.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大将軍ピサロは来てなかったが、４名の魔物将軍と魔人レイ、そしてコンバート
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Great General Pizarro was not present, but four demon generals, the demon Ray, and Convert were there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは彼らに会う前にカオスだけは預からせて欲しいと言われたので預けている（ただし偽者）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before meeting them, Lance was asked to entrust only Chaos, so he did (however, it was a fake).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここで向こうも信じ切って対談しようとしてくるが、ランスはがははと裏切り斬りかかる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At this point, they fully trust and try to negotiate, but Lance laughs and betrays them with a slash.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最初にレイに斬りつけ重傷を負わす
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He first slashes Ray, inflicting a serious wound.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 屋敷の給仕をしていた者はほとんどが先に進入していたランスの部下達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Most of those serving in the mansion were Lance's subordinates who had entered earlier.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタ他メイドさんズ、フレイア
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Biscetta and other maids, Freya.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ４名の魔物将軍を殺し、魔人レイを追い詰める
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They kill the four demon generals and corner the demon Ray.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: (２４０／４／会談３)の後の戦闘、３ラウンド目
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After (240/4/Meeting 3), battle round 3.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイは、不意打ちで喰らったカオスの傷が深くきつい状況
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ray is in a tough situation, badly wounded from the surprise strike of Chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんなチャンスまたとないぞ、いまのうちに一気にせめろ、ぶっ殺せ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is a rare chance—attack all at once now, kill him!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 必要ならシーザー他がランス達がレイとだけ戦える状況らしている事の補足
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If necessary, Caesar and others ensure that Lance and his group are in a situation to fight only Ray.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: (２４０／４／会談３)の後の戦闘、６ラウンド目
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After (240/4/Meeting 3), battle round 6.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くそっ、しぶとい、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Damn, persistent,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰か魔物兵かコンバートとかがレイに脱出を促す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone, perhaps a demon soldier or Convert, urges Ray to escape.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あほか、この俺様がやすやすと逃がすか、てめぇの死に場所はここだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are you stupid? Do you think I’ll let you escape so easily? This is where you die.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイ　くそっ、やばい所に一撃を受けてしまった・・うまくうこげねぇ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ray: Damn, I took a hit in a bad spot... I can’t move well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どりゃ、どりゃ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Take this, take this!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レイは逃げ出す。ランスは追いかける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Ray flees. Lance pursues.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全て見切っていたわと、カチューシャを追い詰める
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Having seen through everything, he corners Katyusha.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうか、クレインか・・魔女が居たのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, Crane huh... There was a witch.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何故だ、こちら側の人間だと思ったのに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why? I thought she was on our side.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪のコントロールは必要無い、俺は正義だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't need to be controlled by evil, I am justice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪は俺が倒すから問題ない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No problem since I’ll defeat evil.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それにセックスで俺をコントロールとか甘い甘い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And trying to control me through sex? That’s naive, naive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺は世界で一番いい女を沢山抱いてきた男だぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm a man who's embraced the best women in the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全裸になってマンコ広げて詫びたら許してやるぞ、がははは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you get naked, spread your pussy, and apologize, I might forgive you. Gahahaha.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カチューシャはランスに捕まる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Katyusha is captured by Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 街中を逃げていくレイ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ray runs through the town.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんなレイを助けたのはメアリーだった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was Mary who helped Ray.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、魔軍
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, the Demon Army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピサロに攻められているコンバート
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Convert is being attacked by Pizarro.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ですが、本来の予定であった本作戦は成功させます、信じて下さい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, we will carry out the original plan successfully. Please believe in us.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 失敗したら殺す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you fail, you will be killed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やばいやばい、あれはわいやない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh no, no, that wasn’t me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カチューシャのアホがかってに早とちりしたんや
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That idiot Katyusha jumped to conclusions on her own.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスか、ヘルマンでもわいの地位を奪った男や
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance, huh? He’s the man who took my position even from Hellman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゆるさへんで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I won’t forgive him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: Ｍランド、夕食後とか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: M Land, after dinner or so...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス、志津香、ナギあたりと会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation with Lance, Shizuka, and Nagi.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これからどうするの、しばらくまだ自由都市に居る？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What are you going to do now? Will you stay in the Free City for a while?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レイは傷を負わせたがまだ止めは刺していないからな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Ray was wounded but not finished off yet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、なかなか出てこないな・・うーん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But he’s not coming out easily... hmm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と言いながら立つランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance stands up saying that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、シィルちゃんの所に行くんだ、エッチだなぁ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, you're going to Seele’s place? How naughty.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それともマリアの所かしら？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or maybe Maria’s place?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とか何か言われる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone says something like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふん、ガキと違って大人は仕事で忙しいのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmph, unlike kids, adults are busy with work.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今夜は・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tonight...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Choice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　敵の情報を精査する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Examine enemy information

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　味方の情報を精査する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Examine ally information

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セシルを呼び出して、セシルとエロするランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance calls Cecil and has erotic time with her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 捕まえたカチューシャをエロするランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance has erotic time with the captured Katyusha.
